About Falcon

  1. Home
  2. About

About Modern Business

Shenzhen Falcon Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2005. We are a hi-tech company engaged in the R&D, production and distribution of proprietary intellectual property products, such as digital products, entertainment products and consumer electronic products. With a focus on innovation, quality, one-stop services and social responsibility, we have become a reliable OEM/ODM partner.

Innovation is one of the reasons why we stand out in the competition. Thanks to our talented engineers and continual investment in R&D, we manage all processes in our 5,000-square-meter facilities according to ISO9001:2008 and IS14001:2009 certificates. Our goods bear CE, FCC and RoHS mtransition name="fade"arks.

We carry out all of our process in-house for quality consistency and low costs. Furthermore, utilizing our own R&D center, our engineers develop cutting-edge technologies to keep clients abreast of the latest trends.
